name: Unreal Banana
description:
I follow the tuto series Unreal Banana made by Game Dev Teacher.

After I were finished, I decided to implement new gameplay mechanics to test myself.

To clear the game, you have to avoid or kill the ennemy and reach the green place.

How to play ?

Z,Q,S,D to move,

Left click to fire,

R to reload,

Escape to pause.

All the assets use are from Quixel Megascans,

the sounds are from Game Dev Teacher Tutorial series.
